# HUD::SET_BLIP_USE_HEIGHT_INDICATOR_ON_EDGE

## Summary
Call with TRUE if you want the arrows indicating height difference to always appear even on the edge of the minimap

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **BOOL** useHeight
